data.actual_result: Box is off-centered. I highly suspect it's depended on screen sizes.
data.short_description: "You played yourself, wait, you can't" box is off centered (possibly for small screen devices specific)
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Spotify enabled in Discord. - Go to Spotify and play a song. - Go to any channel, and find your user. Press on your user. - Your spotify status should be showing. Notice the "You played yourself, wait, you can't" box.
